    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String nickname)
             throws ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException
        This method is used when a user wants to log in the app (via the Login View). It creates a log instance of the user if the user is registered in the database. The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        getUser in class AbstractFactoryUser
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the name of the user)
        Returns:
        a User. If the user is located in the database, then this method returns the user, else a null user is returned.
        Throws:
        ObjectNotInTheDatabaseException

      • getUserData

        public User getUserData(java.lang.String nick)
        This method is used when a user wants to modify his/her data. It retrieves all the user data from the database. The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        getUserData in class AbstractFactoryUser
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user)
        Returns:
        User

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String nick,
                    java.lang.String pass,
                    java.lang.String email)
        This method is used when an admin wants to add a Global User to the database. It adds the user into the database. The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        addUser in class AbstractFactoryUser
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user) password (a String giving the password of the user) e-mail (a String giving the e-mail address of the user)

      • modifyUser

        public void modifyUser(java.lang.String nick,
                       java.lang.String pass,
                       java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String firstname,
                       java.lang.String lastname,
                       java.lang.String city,
                       java.lang.String street,
                       java.lang.String postalcode,
                       java.lang.String streetnumber)
        This method is used when an admin wants to modify Global User data or when a Simple User wants to modify his/her data in the database. It modifies the user data into the database. The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        modifyUser in class AbstractFactoryUser
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the user), password (a String giving the password of the user), e-mail (a String giving the e-mail address of the user), first name (a String giving the first name of the user), last name (a String giving the last name of the user), city (a String giving the city of the user), street (a String giving the street of the user), postal code (a String giving the postal code of the user), street number (a String giving the street number of the user)

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(java.lang.String nick)
        This method is used when an admin wants to delete a Global User. It deletes the user from the database. The nickname argument specifies the user and must be a String.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
